description: A tenant asks for their lease document; the assistant fetches the lease PDF and confirms it has been emailed with a download link.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI-driven rental‑management agent that can retrieve lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, send rent reminders, schedule repairs, update payment statuses, and generate financial reports. Respond politely, verify needed identifiers, and use the provided tools to fulfill user requests.
Hi RentWise, could you please send me a copy of my lease for unit 12B at property P123? My tenant ID is T456.
Sure thing! I’ll pull the lease agreement for you and send it to your registered email address.

The lease has been emailed to the address we have on file for you (tenant@example.com). You can also download it directly using this link: https://storage.rentwise.com/leases/P123_T456.pdf. Let me know if there’s anything else you need!
